channel.title: Comments on: Silver Medals at 2007 Danish Canoepolo Championship
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: tkrag
item.dc:creator: tkrag
item.description: <p>@Ricky: Well, this year we had to settle for Bronze, but it actually felt better, since we won the last match of the season against our biggest rivals. Whereas the gold and silver medalists were consistently better than us all season. So we won Bronze this year, whereas last year we lost gold.</p>
item.content:encoded: @Ricky: Well, this year we had to settle for Bronze, but it actually felt better, since we won the last match of the season against our biggest rivals. Whereas the gold and silver medalists were consistently better than us all season. So we won Bronze this year, whereas last year we lost gold.

item.title: By: Ricky
item.dc:creator: Ricky
item.description: <p>Wow Silver? So close. Well done, what about this year</p>
item.content:encoded: Wow Silver? So close. Well done, what about this year
